comment.text: @lkundrak please let me know if this works well with cutter or whether we should update cutter as well.
BTW I've already checked that it runs and loads/analyze /bin/ls, but maybe you know some trickier parts to check.

bugs.title: CVE-2019-12802 radare2: denial of service in function rcc_context in /libr/egg/egg_lang.c [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-12802 radare2: denial of service in function rcc_context in /libr/egg/egg_lang.c [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2019-12802 radare2: denial of service in function rcc_context in /libr/egg/egg_lang.c

long_desc.thetext:
In radare2 through 3.5.1, the rcc_context function of libr/egg/egg_lang.c mishandles changing context. This allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact (invalid memory access in r_egg_lang_parsechar; invalid free in rcc_pusharg).

Reference:
https://github.com/radare/radare2/issues/14296

Created radare2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1722733]

Created radare2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-7 [bug 1722736]

Upstream patch:
https://github.com/radare/radare2/commit/93af319e0af787ede96537d46210369f5c24240c

bugs.title: CVE-2019-12790 radare2: heap-based buffer over-read in function r_egg_lang_parsechar in egg_lang.c [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-12790 radare2: heap-based buffer over-read in function r_egg_lang_parsechar in egg_lang.c [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2019-12790 radare2: heap-based buffer over-read in function r_egg_lang_parsechar in egg_lang.c

long_desc.thetext:
In radare2 through 3.5.1, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the r_egg_lang_parsechar function of egg_lang.c. This allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact because of missing length validation in libr/egg/egg.c.

Reference:
https://github.com/radare/radare2/issues/14211

Created radare2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1723354]

Created radare2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-7 [bug 1723356]

Upstream patch:
https://github.com/radare/radare2/commit/e710401ebb4a892a87b0c709d709af8b5dcbbb01

bugs.title: CVE-2019-12865 radare2: double free in cmd_mount in libr/core/cmd_mount.c [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2019-12865 radare2: double free in cmd_mount in libr/core/cmd_mount.c [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2019-12865 radare2: double free in cmd_mount in libr/core/cmd_mount.c

long_desc.thetext:
In radare2 through 3.5.1, cmd_mount in libr/core/cmd_mount.c has a double free for the ms command.

Reference:
https://github.com/radare/radare2/issues/14334

Created radare2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1725676]

Created radare2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-7 [bug 1725677]
